cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's renjitsu

sentence.kanji: 展覧会は連日賑わいました。
sentence.romaji: tenrankai ha renjitsu nigiwaimashita
sentence.english: The exhibition was crowded every day.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kurumaisu

sentence.kanji: 彼女は車椅子に乗っています。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha kurumaisu ni noteimasu 。
sentence.english: She uses a wheelchair.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's takai

sentence.kanji: これがこの町で一番高いビルです。
sentence.romaji: kore ga kono machi de ichiban takai biru desu
sentence.english: This is the tallest building in town.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shuu

sentence.kanji: その次の週は空いてますか。
sentence.romaji: sono tsugi no shuu ha aitemasu ka
sentence.english: Are you free the following week?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's uru

sentence.kanji: 彼は家を売った。
sentence.romaji: kare ha ie wo uta
sentence.english: He sold the house.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's senshuu

sentence.kanji: 先週は海に行った。
sentence.romaji: senshuu ha umi ni ita
sentence.english: I went to the beach last week.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shuumatsu

sentence.kanji: 週末は家でゆっくりします。
sentence.romaji: shuumatsu ha uchi de yukuri shimasu
sentence.english: On the weekend I relax at home.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ureru

sentence.kanji: 今年の夏はクーラーがよく売れた。
sentence.romaji: kotoshi no natsu ha ku-ra- ga yoku ureta
sentence.english: Air conditioners sold well this summer.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's urikire

sentence.kanji: チケットはもう売り切れだって。
sentence.romaji: chiketo ha mou urikire date
sentence.english: The tickets have sold out already.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hakobu

sentence.kanji: いすを二階に運んでください。
sentence.romaji: isu wo nikai ni hakonde kudasai
sentence.english: Please carry the chair to the second floor.

cards.english: be sold out, go out of stock
cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's urikireru

sentence.kanji: その本は直ぐ売り切れた。
sentence.romaji: sono hon ha sugu urikireta
sentence.english: The book sold out quickly.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's suzushii

sentence.kanji: 夕方は涼しくなりますよ。
sentence.romaji: yuugata ha suzushiku narimasu yo
sentence.english: It gets cooler in the evening.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shuuhen

sentence.kanji: この周辺には大学が多い。
sentence.romaji: kono shuuhen ni ha daigaku ga ooi
sentence.english: There are a lot of universities in this area.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's takasa

sentence.kanji: 富士山の高さは3,776メートルです。
sentence.romaji: fujisan no takasa ha sanzennanahyaku-nanajuurokume-toru desu
sentence.english: The height of Mt. Fuji is 3,776m.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yume

sentence.kanji: 昨夜恐ろしい夢を見た。
sentence.romaji: yuube osoroshii yume wo mita
sentence.english: I had a terrible dream last night.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yasuuri

sentence.kanji: あの店で野菜の安売りをしていましたよ。
sentence.romaji: ano mise de yasai no yasuuri wo shite imashita yo
sentence.english: Vegetables were on special at that store.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's un

sentence.kanji: 彼は運のいい男です。
sentence.romaji: kare ha un no ii otoko desu
sentence.english: He is a lucky man.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's takameru

sentence.kanji: 自分を高めるのは大切なことです。
sentence.romaji: jibun wo takameru no ha taisetsu na koto desu
sentence.english: It's important to improve oneself.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's uriage

sentence.kanji: この会社の売り上げは昨年の2倍ね。
sentence.romaji: kono kaisha no uriage ha sakunen no ni bai ne
sentence.english: Sales of the company have doubled from last year.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's muchuu

sentence.kanji: うちの子はその本に夢中です。
sentence.romaji: uchi no ko ha sono hon ni muchuu desu
sentence.english: Our child is fascinated by that book.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's doushi

sentence.kanji: 彼と私はいとこ同士です。
sentence.romaji: kare to watashi ha itoko doushi desu
sentence.english: He and I are cousins.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ishuu

sentence.kanji: 私たちは庭園を一周しました。
sentence.romaji: watashitachi ha teien wo ishuu shimashita
sentence.english: We went around the garden.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kougen

sentence.kanji: 高原には気持ちのいい風が吹いていたよ。
sentence.romaji: kougen ni ha kimochi no ii kaze ga fuiteita yo 。
sentence.english: A pleasant breeze blew across the plateau.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hakushi

sentence.kanji: 彼は数学の博士だそうです。
sentence.romaji: kare ha suugaku no hakushi da sou desu
sentence.english: I hear he has a Ph.D in math.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hakase

sentence.kanji: 彼は物理学の博士です。
sentence.romaji: kare ha butsurigaku no hakase desu
sentence.english: He's a doctor of physics.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's takamaru

sentence.kanji: その計画に対する反対の声が高まっているわ。
sentence.romaji: sono keikaku ni taisuru hantai no koe ga takamate iru wa
sentence.english: Opposition to the plan is increasing.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kagayaku

sentence.kanji: 彼女の瞳は喜びで輝いていますね。
sentence.romaji: kanojo no hitomi ha yorokobi de kagayaite imasu ne
sentence.english: Her eyes are shining with delight.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gun

sentence.kanji: 怪我人は軍の病院に運ばれたよ。
sentence.romaji: keganin ha gun no byouin ni hakobareta yo
sentence.english: The injured were taken to the army hospital.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's daigaku

sentence.kanji: 大学に行ってもっと勉強したいです。
sentence.romaji: daigaku ni ite moto benkyou shitai desu
sentence.english: I want to go to college and study more.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tokei

sentence.kanji: 時計を見たらちょうど3時だった。
sentence.romaji: tokei wo mitara choudo sanji data
sentence.english: I looked at the clock and it was exactly three.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kakinaosu

sentence.kanji: この書類を書き直してください。
sentence.romaji: kono shorui wo kakinaoshite kudasai
sentence.english: Please rewrite this document.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hanasu

sentence.kanji: 母と電話で話しました。
sentence.romaji: haha to denwa de hanashimashita
sentence.english: I spoke to my mother on the phone.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kaku

sentence.kanji: 彼に手紙を書きました。
sentence.romaji: kare ni tegami wo kakimashita
sentence.english: I wrote him a letter.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yomu

sentence.kanji: 彼女は雑誌を読んでいます。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha zashi wo yonde imasu
sentence.english: She's reading the magazine.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kotoba

sentence.kanji: この言葉の意味が分かりません。
sentence.romaji: kono kotoba no imi ga wakarimasen
sentence.english: I don't understand the meaning of this word.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's oboeru

sentence.kanji: 妹は平仮名を全部覚えました。
sentence.romaji: imouto ha hiragana wo zenbu oboemashita
sentence.english: My little sister learned all the hiragana.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's iu

sentence.kanji: 上司が「一杯、飲もう。」と言った。
sentence.romaji: joushi ga ipai nomou to ita
sentence.english: My boss said: "Let's have a drink."

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kataru

sentence.kanji: 今夜は大いに語りましょう。
sentence.romaji: konya ha ooini katarimashou
sentence.english: Let's talk about everything tonight.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sameru

sentence.kanji: 今朝は6時に目が覚めた。
sentence.romaji: kesa ha rokuji ni me ga sameta
sentence.english: I woke up at six o'clock this morning.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's samasu

sentence.kanji: 子供が目を覚ました。
sentence.romaji: kodomo ga me wo samashita
sentence.english: The child woke up.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hanashiau

sentence.kanji: 私たちはよく話し合いました。
sentence.romaji: watashitachi ha yoku hanashiaimashita
sentence.english: We often talked to each other.

cards.english: observation tour, study tour, field trip
cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kengaku

sentence.kanji: 今日、工場の見学に行きました。
sentence.romaji: kyou koujou no kengaku ni ikimashita
sentence.english: We went on a field trip to a factory today.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hanashi

sentence.kanji: あなたの話は面白いね。
sentence.romaji: anata no hanashi ha omoshiroi ne
sentence.english: Your story's interesting.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yomi

sentence.kanji: 母に読み書きを習いました。
sentence.romaji: haha ni yomikaki wo naraimashita
sentence.english: I learned reading and writing from my mother.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chuugaku

sentence.kanji: 息子は中学に通っています。
sentence.romaji: musuko ha chuugaku ni kayote imasu
sentence.english: My son goes to junior high.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gengo

sentence.kanji: 彼はアジアの言語を研究している。
sentence.romaji: kare ha ajia no gengo wo kenkyuu shite iru
sentence.english: He's doing research in Asian languages.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's soudan

sentence.kanji: 相談したいことがあります。
sentence.romaji: soudan shitai koto ga arimasu
sentence.english: I'd like to get your advice on something.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shiraberu

sentence.kanji: この単語の意味を辞書で調べましょう。
sentence.romaji: kono tango no imi wo jisho de shirabemashou
sentence.english: Let's look up the meaning of this word in the dictionary.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hagaki

sentence.kanji: 家族に葉書を書いています。
sentence.romaji: kazoku ni hagaki wo kaiteimasu 。
sentence.english: I wrote a postcard to my family.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mezamashidokei

sentence.kanji: 7時に目覚まし時計が鳴りました。
sentence.romaji: shichiji ni mezamashidokei ga narimashita
sentence.english: The alarm clock went off at seven o'clock.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's joudan

sentence.kanji: 冗談は止めてください。
sentence.romaji: joudan ha yamete kudasai
sentence.english: Please stop joking.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's keigo

sentence.kanji: お客様には敬語を使いなさい。
sentence.romaji: okyakusama ni ha keigo wo tsukainasai
sentence.english: Use polite language to customers.
